events.name: Battery production and utilization
events.wd_description: The process of producing lithium-ion batteries for electric vehicles, including the role of lithium in powering the vehicle.
events.description: The process of producing lithium-ion batteries for electric vehicles, including the role of lithium in powering the vehicle.

events.name: Battery recharging
events.wd_description: The process of recharging lithium-ion batteries for electric vehicles.

events.name: Battery disposal

events.name: Battery research and development
events.wd_description: The process of researching and developing new lithium-ion battery technologies.

events.name: Price decrease factors
events.wd_description: Factors that may reduce the price of lithium batteries, such as improvements in battery technology and large-scale production.
